original_title: 大学生バイトの僕が押しに弱いパート人妻とコンビニ下衆不倫に狂った毎日 星宮一花
overview: Konishi is a college student who takes a part-time job at a convenience store. There, here meets with Ichika, a married housewife.  One day, after a couple of friendly drinks she reveals to him that her husband is cheating her. They find common ground, and he quickly moves to seduce her…
title: I Seduced The Vulnerable Married Woman I Work With And We Spent All Day Fucking In The Work Toilet! Ichika Hoshimiya
